news.content: Robin Heckenauer was at CBMS 2023 to present our work on DL for colon cancer mutation detection
Members of our team participated to ORASIS 2023
New paper on arxiv on classifiers comparison!
Jonathan Weber was at JURSE 2023 for co-chairing a special session on DL for for urban areas analysis
One journal paper accepted in Knowledge and Information Systems (KAIS) on time series averaging!
Welcome to Abir Benaissa who just started her Master Internship to work on the DELEGATION project
Congratulation to Romain Wenger who defended his PhD!
Phd students participated at la journée scientifique autour de l'IA en région Grand-Est
Ali El Hadi Ismail Fawaz was at ICAART 2023 to present our work on self-supervised learning for TSC
Lynn Miller, PhD student at Monash University, visited our group for one week
Welcome to Artughrul, Huseyn and Mario who just started their Master internship in our team!
Welcome to Laman Hasanli who joined us as a research engineer, to work on the Enygma project
Bruno Come starts his PhD in our team to work on graph images analysis and data visualization
Maxime Devanne was at FG 2023 for chairing the LFA-FG Workshop
Ali El Hadi Ismail Fawaz was at IEEE BigData 2022 to present our work on custom filters for TSC
Congratulation to Milos Cuculovic who defended his PhD!
Charlotte Pelletier visited our group and gave a talk on Satellite Images Time Series
Ali El Hadi Ismail Fawaz starts his PhD in our team to work in the DELEGATION project
Geoff Webb visited our group and gave a talk on TSC
One journal paper accepted in Artificial Intelligence In Medicine on histopathological image segmentation
Welcome to Abdul Wahid who joined us as a research engineer, to work on the Enygma project
Elvin Ismayilzada is now a research engineer in our team, working on the REVEIL project
Javidan Abdullayev is now a research engineer in our team, working on the Enygma project
We organize the 1st Workshop on Learning with few or without annotated face, body and gesture data at FG 2023
Maxime Devanne was in Padua at IJCNN 2022 for presenting our work on knowledge distillation for TSC
Congratulation to Tsegamlak Terefe Debella who defended his PhD!
At ICPRAI 2022 in Paris for co-chairing our Time Series Analysis special session
At Laboratoire national de santé (LNS) in Luxembourg for the Mi*EDGE consortium meeting
Maxime Devanne was at EuroMov Digital Health in Motion in Montpellier to give a talk on time series and rehabilitation
One conference paper accepted at IJCNN 2022 on knowledge distillation for time series classification
Kick-off meeting of DELEGATION project
Vasile Giurgi starts his PhD in collaboration with the MIAM team on DL and data fusion in autonomous vehicles
Welcome to Asmaa, Amir, Elvin, Hadi and Javidan who just started their Master internship within our team !
One journal paper accepted in BioMed Research International on humanoid robot coach and rehabilitation
Congratulation to Mounir Bendali-Braham who defended his PhD!
One journal paper accepted in Software: Practice and Experience on semantics for document-based XML diff
One conference paper accepted at PAKDD 2022 on smooth adversarial attacks for time series classification
One conference paper accepted at VISAPP 2022 on ensemble clustering for histopathological images segmentation
We are organizing a Special Session on Time Series Analysis (TSA) in conjunction with ICPRAI 2022
6 months Master internship position on Deep Learning architectures for generating human motion
One year postdoctoral position on banking data analysis for fraud detection
Congratulation to Baptiste Lafabrègue who defended his PhD!
One journal paper accepted in Computers in Biology and Medicine on DL for colon cancer in histopathological images
The DELEGATION project (ANR JCJC) has been accepted and funded by ANR!
One conference paper accepted at ISPA 2021 about ensemble classification of video-recorded crowd movements
New journal paper on an automatic framework for fusing information from differently stained digital whole slide images!
New journal paper on crowd analysis in Machine Learning with Applications!
Jonathan Weber defended his HDR (Habilitation), congrats Jonathan!
Mouad Hamri starts his PhD in our MSD team on automatic data extraction from invoices
We are organizing APTA Workshop in conjunction with EGC 2021
Gautier Pialla starts his PhD in the MSD team on deep learning for time series
The DeepRehab project has been accepted for 1 year funding
Congratulation to Hassan Ismail Fawaz who defended his PhD!
Germain Forestier gave a talk on DL for TSC at the Summer School: Machine Learning and Deep Learning Applications.
One conference paper accepted at ICTAI 2020 on averaging time series using Multi-Task Autoencoder
Olivier Schirm starts his PhD in collaboration with ICube and Visorando on spatio-temporal hiking data analysis
One conference paper accepted at DocEng 2020 on XML Diff Comparison
Mihreteab Negash Geletu starts his PhD in collaboration with the MIAM team on DL and data fusion in autonomous vehicles
In Bruxelles for co-chairing the APTA Workshop organized in conjunction with EGC 2020
